note[0]: scare the pants off somebody informal (=scare someone very much)
example[0]: Loud noises can scare animals or birds.
example[1]: The alarm scared the hell out of me.
note[1]: scare the life/living daylights/hell etc out of somebody
example[2]: You really gave us a scare!
definition[2]: a situation in which a lot of people become frightened about something
